name: Quentin Petiteville
title: Software Engineering Student
description: I build accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences for the web. Currently pursuing my degree in Software Engineering while crafting thoughtful solutions that blend robust engineering with intuitive design.
availability: Available for a 6-month internship starting 4th of March 2026 !

hero.subtitle: Pairing clean engineering with thoughtful UX to help product teams ship confident experiences.
focus: Frontend engineering with React, TypeScript, Next.js and Motion
Design-to-code workflows with accessibility and localization in mind
Bilingual collaboration across French and English product teams

sidebar.title: What I bring to your team
sidebar.description: A product-minded engineer who enjoys bridging design systems, performance and delivery.
sidebar.note: Open to remote or on-site collaborations with ambitious teams.

highlights.title: Product-minded engineering that ships
highlights.description: I bridge thoughtful UX, modern tooling, and reliable delivery to create experiences that teams can trust.

craft.title: Pixel-perfect interfaces
craft.description: Design systems, responsive layouts, and accessible interactions that make complex products feel effortless.

performance.title: Performance obsessed
performance.description: Measure, iterate, and optimize for speed — from Core Web Vitals to build tooling and deployment workflows.

collaboration.title: Team-first collaborator
collaboration.description: Pair with designers, product owners, and stakeholders to clarify requirements and ship reliable releases on time.

delivery.title: End-to-end delivery
delivery.description: From idea to production: plan scopes, automate quality checks, and iterate with feedback to achieve measurable impact.

skills.title: Core capabilities

experience.title: Recent missions
experience.description: Hands-on roles where I led UI rebuilds, improved performance, and collaborated with cross-functional teams.

items.summary: Rebuilt the marketing website with Next.js App Router, Tailwind, and localization — improving maintainability and Lighthouse scores.
Designed data-heavy screens, automated reporting workflows, and enhanced product reliability with modern tooling.

ctaBanner.title: Ready to build your next experience?
ctaBanner.description: I’m currently looking for internship opportunities where I can elevate the frontend, move fast with quality, and learn from a great team.
